text: Abo bangamakholwa bahlala (ekhaya), ngaphandle kwabo baziimbedlenge, (nabalimeleyo), abalingani nabo bazabalaza nzima balwe eNdleleni ka-All창h ngobutyebi babo nangobomi babo. UAll창h Ubahlele ngokwamahlelo abo bazabalaza nzima balwe ngobutyebi babo nangobomi babo, bangentla kwabo bahlala (ekhaya). Kuye ngamnye kubo uAll창h Uthembisa (ngePaladesi), kodwa uAll창h Uthanda abo balwayo ngaphezu kwabo bahlala [ekhaya (yaye) Uza kubanika] umvuzo omkhulu
